subject: Curlin (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Any Given Saturday, winner of the Grade I Haskell Invitational over Hard Spun and Curlin, will stand at stud at Darley at Jonabell in Lexington, Ky. The stud fee will be $40,000, the stable announced.
